entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
